|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 411 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB411 |page_start_date = 05/09/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/MikroTik_RouterBOARD_411_(RB411) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RB411AR, TV7RB411UAHR |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7130;AR7130-BC1A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND512W3A2DN6; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H561638N-LCCC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8012; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0C:42, D4:CA:6D
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 12-28 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RS232,, (DB9),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1; ,,, High Performance CPLD;Xilinx;XC9536XL;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/02/2009 |estreldate = 01/31/2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 700175496195 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004EHRDF0 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/RB400L_differences.pdf Differences RB411/RB411L] :[http://routerboard.com/pdf/rb411ugA.pdf User's Manual] (dated 2008-01-31)
This device is using an [http://www.xilinx.com/support/documentation/data_sheets/ds058.pdf ''Xilinx'' XC9536XL CPLD]. :Flash and RAM manufacturer varies widely on examples in use. Newer versions have 128MB flash and use IC+ IP101A for ETH chip2 instead of [[Atheros]] AR8012.
===Device versions=== *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411l_mikrotik_routerboard_411l_-level_rb411l_rb-411l-p-5834.html MikroTik RB411L] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/64MB) [http://routerboard.com/RB411L PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411r_routerboard_with_300mhz_atheros_cpu-_32mb_ram-_lan-_built_2-4ghz_wireless_card-_routeros-p-3024.html MikroTik RB411R] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/802.11bg) [http://routerboard.com/RB411R PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411ar_routerboard_300mhz_atheros_minipci-_2-4ghz_wireless_routeros-p-3025.html MikroTik RB411AR] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/miniPCI/AR2417 (bg)) [http://routerboard.com/RB411AR PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411u_routerboard_with_300mhz_atheros_cpu-_32mb_ram-_lan-_minipci-_1minipcie-_slot-_routeros-p-3023.html MikroTik RB411U] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/USB 2.0/miniPCIe/SIM) [http://routerboard.com/RB411U PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411ah_atheros_ar7130_300mhz_memory_storage_routeros-p-3026.html MikroTik RB411AH] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/32MB/64MB/miniPCI/LAN) [http://routerboard.com/RB411AH PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411gl_mikrotik_routerboard-p-5833.html MikroTik RB411GL] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/32MB/64MB/miniPCI/LAN) [http://routerboard.com/RB411GL PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411uahl_mikrotik_routerboard_411uahl-p-5835.html MikroTik RB411UAHL] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/64MB/miniPCI/LAN/USB 2.0) [http://routerboard.com/RB411UAHL PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411uahr-_mikrotik_routerboard_411uahr_-level_rb411uahr_rb-411uahr-p-4227.html MikroTik RB411UAHR] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/64MB/USB 2.0/AR2417 (bg)) [http://routerboard.com/RB411UAHR PPage]
